interface.name: mdio_io
interface.description: Secondary interface to communicate with Ethernet PHY.

interface.name: ddr4_sdram
interface.description: DDR4 board interface uses MIG IP for connection

component.name: sys_diff_clock
component.description: LVDS differential 300 MHz oscillator used as system differential clock on the board

component.name: pcie_ref_clock
component.description: Clock input from PCI Express edge connector

component.name: sys_reset
component.description: CPU Reset Push Button, Active Low
